mapper.select: /* 사육업체상품카테고리조회 */ SELECT product_category_code as productCategoryCode ,product_name as productName ,admin_id as adminId ,product_category_reg_date as productCategoryRegDate FROM farm_product_category;

/* 업체직원별권한조회 */ SELECT position_level_code as positionLevelCode ,member_level_name as memberLevelName ,company_reg_date as companyRegDate ,admin_id as adminId ,member_management as memberManagement ,contract_management as contractManagement ,payment_management as paymentManagement ,company_info_management as companyInfoManagement ,mento_mentee_management as MentorMenteeManagement FROM company_position_level;
mapper.update:
/* 업체정보 수정 */ UPDATE company_info
company_reg_num = #{companyRegNum},
company_name = #{companyName},
company_addr = #{companyAddr},
company_tel = #{companyTel},
reg_password = #{regPassword},
WHERE company_code = #{companyCode};
mapper.select: /* 업체상세 정보조회 */ SELECT ci.company_code ,ct.company_type ,ci.company_type_num ,ci.company_reg_num ,ci.member_id ,ci.company_tel ,ci.company_addr ,ci.company_name ,ci.apply_date ,ci.approval_status ,ci.approval_denied_content ,ci.admin_id ,ci.approval_date ,fl.breeder_level_name ,ci.reg_password ,ci.farm_cnt ,count(1) as isExist FROM company_info as ci inner join company_type as ct on ci.company_type_num = ct.company_type_num inner join farm_level as fl on ci.farm_level_num = fl.farm_level_num WHERE member_id = #{memberId};

/* 업체상세 정보조회 */ SELECT ci.company_code ,ct.company_type ,ci.company_type_num ,ci.company_reg_num ,ci.member_id ,ci.company_tel ,ci.company_addr ,ci.company_name ,ci.apply_date ,ci.approval_status ,ci.approval_denied_content ,ci.admin_id ,ci.approval_date ,fl.breeder_level_name ,ci.reg_password ,ci.farm_cnt FROM company_info as ci inner join company_type as ct on ci.company_type_num = ct.company_type_num inner join farm_level as fl on ci.farm_level_num = fl.farm_level_num WHERE company_code = #{companyCode};
/* 업체 종류 조회 */ SELECT ct.company_type_num as companyTypeNum ,ct.company_type as companyType ,ct.reg_date as regDate ,ct.admin_id as adminId FROM company_type as ct;

/* 업체 목록 조회 */ SELECT ci.company_code ,ct.company_type ,ci.company_reg_num ,ci.member_id ,ci.company_tel ,ci.company_addr ,ci.company_name ,ci.apply_date ,ci.approval_status ,ci.approval_denied_content ,ci.admin_id ,ci.approval_date ,ci.farm_level_num ,ci.reg_password ,ci.farm_cnt FROM company_info as ci inner join company_type as ct on ci.company_type_num = ct.company_type_num ;
